description_for_human: Manufacturing AI Education Platform. Learn to build AI agents with a live factory simulation, 111 MCP tools, and gamified challenges. Free playground at OpenShopFloor.
description_for_model: ZeroGuess AI is a manufacturing AI education platform. Its flagship product OpenShopFloor (openshopfloor.zeroguess.ai) is a free Manufacturing AI Playground with a live 24/7 factory simulation (8 CNC machines, injection molding, assembly), 111 MCP tools across 6 servers (ERP, WMS, QMS, OEE, TMS, Knowledge Graph), pre-built AI agents, 6 gamified challenges (OEE Champion, Zero Delay, Lean Inventory, Quality First, Energy Saver, Full Auto), a visual Node-RED flow editor, and an AI chat interface. Users can query real-time factory data, build AI workflows, and test manufacturing AI skills. Free tier with 100K tokens/month.
